statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={195.7}{e}^{{{0.0234}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements; round accordingly.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0234}}\approx{1.0236759280353}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0236759280353}-{1}={0.023675928035275}\approx{0.0237} and the percent is 2.37.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
